original_title: Lesbian Beauties 2: Older Women - Younger Girls
overview: Younger girls and older women have a deep fascination with each other. While young girls possess beauty, innocence and curiosity, older women have knowledge and experience in life - and in be - that younger girls crave. Explosive lesbian sex occurs when these natural enemies discover all they really want is each other.
title: Lesbian Beauties 2: Older Women - Younger Girls
